name: Gravitee Wars Online
description:
Battle for control of the galaxy in this online multiplayer artillery game. Use the gravity of planets to slingshot your missiles into your enemies until only one team remains. 2 - 4 player multiplayer with bots available to fill empty slots. Upgrade your team and buy new weapons as you earn xp.

Build your own levels to battle on and share your best shots online for the galaxy to see. Features 50 weapons to unlock and 100 awards to earn plus daily and weekly awards.
